alert.note: Alert for Jack; Palo Pinto; Parker; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 4:49AM CDT until March 24 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wise County in north central Texas... Southeastern Jack County in north central Texas... Northwestern Parker County in north central Texas... Northeastern Palo Pinto County in north central Texas... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 448 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Graford, or 10 miles north of Mineral Wells, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Decatur, Bridgeport, Briar, Pecan Acres, Springtown, Rhome, New Fairview, Aurora, Boyd, Poolville, Paradise, Runaway Bay, Newark, Perrin, Lake Bridgeport, Advance, Salesville, Cottondale, Gibtown and Joplin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
